## Class `Maximum`

Layer that computes the maximum (element-wise) a list of inputs.



### Aliases:

* Class <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/layers/Maximum"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.layers.Maximum</code></a>
* Class <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/layers/Maximum"><code>tf.compat.v2.keras.layers.Maximum</code></a>


<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->

It takes as input a list of tensors,
all of the same shape, and returns
a single tensor (also of the same shape).
